message: Substance abuse disorders and mental health concerns are well-known issues with substantial impacts on legal professionals. They impact not only an attorney’s personal life, but the ability to practice law and adhere to professional obligations.

In our next Justia Webinar, Brian Cuban walks attendees through his life, beginning with his childhood in Pittsburgh with his brother Mark Cuban, his experiences at Penn State University and the University of Pittsburg School of Law, and his journey with addiction and recovery while practicing law in Dallas, Texas. Brian uses his story to illustrate the consequences of traumatic experiences and the ways in which mental health and substance abuse issues may present in law students and lawyers.
The Addicted Lawyer. How We Got Here. Where We Are Headed. begins promptly at 1:00 p.m. ET/10:00 a.m. PT on Thursday, January 4, 2024.
bottomline: Seats are limited, so reserve yours today!

message: Lawyers often battle substance abuse disorders and face mental health challenges at higher rates than other professionals. These struggles impact attorneys in all aspects of life, including their ability to competently practice the law.

In our next Justia Webinar, Brian Cuban walks attendees through his life, beginning with his childhood in Pittsburgh with his brother Mark Cuban, his experiences at Penn State University and the University of Pittsburg School of Law, and his journey with addiction and recovery while practicing law in Dallas, Texas. Brian uses his story to illustrate the consequences of traumatic experiences and the ways in which mental health and substance abuse issues may present in law students and lawyers.
The Addicted Lawyer. How We Got Here. Where We Are Headed. begins promptly at 1:00 p.m. ET/10:00 a.m. PT, tomorrow January 4, 2024.

message: Hi Name,

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 11:00 a.m. PT on Saturday, January 6, 2024 to receive credit.
Completing Your Attendance Verification
number-list: Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the MCLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.

message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, The Addicted Lawyer. How We Got Here. Where We Are Headed. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
